name: This Sphere Ain't Big Enuff Fer The Both Of Us...
name_original: This Sphere Ain't Big Enuff Fer The Both Of Us...
description:
Welcome to the Sphere with no name... You wandered in here at a peculiar time stranger. The best and deadliest gunslingers in all the hump-backed sky are gatherin' at The Side-Eye Saloon lookin' for a shoot out. Best beware you don't go causin' fights you can't win.

As soon as you step foot in the sphere, gunslingers are gonna keep on poppin' up like warts on a toad until the whole dang Sphere is full of 'em. Soon enough they'll start spillin' over and appearing in all sorts of different spheres!

This Sphere Ain't Big Enough Fer The Both Of Us is a micro setting which includes a rootin' tootin' Gunslinger Generator and optional rules of Quick Draws, high stakes duels that are lightning fast and deadly as heck!
